question: What would you NOT want to be described as
You are stargazing one night, and one constellation draws you to it
answers: Briar - a tree bearing gold fruit

question: What would you like people to remember you as
You are faced with four chests, you only have one key. Which chest do you open
answers: Panuk - An icy, blue chest with a snowflake crest incrusted with extraordinarily coloured gemstones
Zuberi - A golden chest that glows red hot, you have an overbearing feeling that the treasure inside is outofworldly
Mira - A soaking wet chest covered in barnacles, starfish and anemones, you faintly hear beautiful singing as you approach it
Briar - A chest with vines and branches encasing it, as if the chest itself is a life source, with every step you take the vines recede revealing a glowing keyhole

question: You sit down for a delicious meal with your tribe. What’s on the menu
answers: Panuk - A hot, spicy stew with warm steamed rice, accompanied by a tangy salad
Zuberi - A leg of seasoned meat with a bowl of maise and gravy
Mira - Citrusy fish with perfectly roasted potatoes
Briar - Stir-fried vegetables with homemade noodles, followed by a colourful fruit salad

question: You have reached the final battle of your adventure. From your tunic you reveal your weapon
answers: Panuk - A wavy, sliver blade with mysterious carvings that seems to be enchanted by an ancient spell
Zuberi - A powerful bo staff you are able to move so fast you leave a trail of flames
Mira - A mighty trident decorated with shells that has been borrowed from Posidon himself
Briar - An forbidding syth, its blade dripping with an iridescent liquid you know to be a rare poison

question: You are required to study an animal. Which do you choose
You heard a rumour that there is a dangerous creature in a nearby cave. Do you
answers: Panuk - warn your village, gathering a group and going together to investigate
Zuberi - immediately investigate on your own with one hand on your weapon at all times
Mira - try to intice the beast out of the cave into a trap you built
Briar - block the cave entrance with large boulders

question: A seamstress is making you an outfit and asks which colours you would like
You have entered an infamous SolMad casino. Which game do you go to first
